title: Not sure if bug but i never got my mastery token?
body: I played rammus on twisted tree line and got a S with him. If i'm correctly reading how tokens are earned i should have gotten one. I'm working towards mastery 7 so S- wont get me one but S will. I also do not understand the  "champ mastery-enabled queue" means. There is nothing saying twisted tree line won't give tokens. In fact it seems to be the same as summoners rift. Or is there only a chance of getting a token when you get S or S+? If so that is extremely silly.

replies.body: Zombiemaster has provided some helpful information here.  To confirm per our[ Champion Mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5) guide, level 6 and 7 tokens are currently only eligible  in Summoner's Rift normal and ranked.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5

> You can only earn Mastery 6 and 7 tokens in Summoner's Rift normal and ranked games.
nvm i guess. I wish they mentioned that when you go to play games.
It was mentioned in the 6.12 patch notes that while ARAM and TT grant champion mastery points, they won't grant the mastery level 6/7 tokens, along with the rotating game modes.
That doesnt make sense though because twisted tree line is "champ mastery-enabled queue" as its put.
